anl.verdi.plot.gui

Interface PlotListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VerdiApplication

    public interface PlotListener
    Interface for classes that listen to plot events.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    Nick Collier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void areaSelected(AreaSelectionEvent event)
      Notifies this PlotListener when a plot has some of its area selected.
      void overlayRequested(OverlayRequest request)
      Notifies the PlotListener of a request to create an overlay for the sending plot.
      void plotProbed(ProbeEvent event)
      Notifies this PlotListener when a plot has been probed.
      void plotRequested(PlotRequest request)
      Notifies this PlotListener of a request to create a plot fired from a another plot.

    • Method Detail

      • areaSelected

        void areaSelected(AreaSelectionEvent event)
        Notifies this PlotListener when a plot has some of its area selected.
        Parameters:
        event - the area selection

      • plotProbed

        void plotProbed(ProbeEvent event)
        Notifies this PlotListener when a plot has been probed.
        Parameters:
        event - the probe

      • plotRequested

        void plotRequested(PlotRequest request)
        Notifies this PlotListener of a request to create a plot fired from a another plot.
        Parameters:
        request - the request

      • overlayRequested

        void overlayRequested(OverlayRequest request)
        Notifies the PlotListener of a request to create an overlay for the sending plot. The listener shoudl add the appropriate overlay evaluator to the request
        Parameters:
        request - the overlay request
